parameters: \n<Alain>We have to go after that wolf beastkin.

what our next move is if we want to take

\nr<Wolf Beastkin>Oh, but maybe I can help.

\nr<Eury>Rhea, what's going on? I came back to find out that

my golems suddenly got activated by you.
\n<Gale>Eh? Isn't that the elf who wanted the Black Ruby?
\nr<Eury>What in the-?! You're from the guild!
\nr<Eury>That brat Bryn sent you, didn't she? Is that why
she ended up changing her mind about the Black Ruby?
She wanted to find out where I was hiding?
\nr<Eury>But she was a fool for having you deliver me an
actual Black Ruby. That was the last item I needed!
\nr<Eury>No adventurer's going to stop me. I don't care
how many cursed items I'll spread throwing away those
failed prototypes! I'm creating that ring!
\nc<Rhea>Yeah. That's right, Boss! We're not going to be

\nr<Eury>But this is all for Sitri's sake. I WILL

\n<Gale>Miss Demon? How are you here? And Mini?
\nr<Est>Call me Est. This is just a copy made from a talisman.
I'm here to help out your rider so he doesn't screw up

\n<Gale>Ngrh... She paralyzed us so quickly? I can't move...
